title: Analysis of Factors Influencing Online and Face-to-Face Class Selection: Case Study in Science Education

context.prior_knowledge: Basic scientific knowledge and experience with digital device usage
context.additional_context: Participants are current science education teachers or general citizens analyzing factors influencing online/face-to-face class selections based on blended learning experiences

learning_goals: Participants can explain five core variables influencing the choice between online/in-person instruction.
Participants can design an optimal learning approach tailored to their personal context in blended learning environments.
Participants can submit an educational scenario reflecting their learning preferences through project-based assessment.
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
